body: Numerous types of drugs exist, both in the real world and fantasy worlds. Presented here are several samples with a variety of effects. All drugs have the following features.
name: Sample Drugs
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs

sections.body: This notes how the drug is introduced into the system. These types equate to the types most common to poisons: contact, ingestion, inhalation, injury.
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/Type
sections.name: Type

sections.body: This is the severity of the addiction disease the drug causes, followed by the base DC of the save a character must succeed at to resist an addiction and potentially overcome an addiction. This DC can increase through multiple uses of the drug.
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/Addiction
sections.name: Addiction

sections.body: The common price of 1 dose of this drug.
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/Price
sections.name: Price

sections.body: The duration and effect of the drug.
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/Effect
sections.name: Effect

sections.body: The amount and type of ability damage caused.
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/Damage
sections.name: Damage
AEther
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/AEther
sections.effect: 1d4 hours; user must make a caster check to cast spells, DC 15 + spell level

sections.name: Dwarven Fire Ale
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/Dwarven Fire Ale

sections.name: Elven Absinthe
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/Elven Absinthe

sections.name: Flayleaf
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/Flayleaf
sections.effect: 1 hour; +2 alchemical bonus on saves against mind-affecting effects, fatigue

sections.name: Opium
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/Opium
sections.effect: 1 hour; +1d8 temporary hit points, +2 alchemical bonus on Fortitude saves, fatigue

sections.name: Pesh
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/Pesh

sections.name: Scour
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/Scour
sections.effect: 3 hours; +1d4 alchemical bonus to Dexterity, -1d4 penalty to Wisdom

sections.name: Shiver
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/Shiver
sections.effect: variable; 50% chance to sleep for 1d4 hours or gain immunity to fear for 1d4 minutes

sections.name: Zerk
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Drugs and Addiction/Sample Drugs/Zerk
sections.effect: 1 hour; +1 alchemical bonus to initiative. If addicted, the user also gains a +1d4 alchemical bonus to Strength for as long as he is addicted
